channel.title: Forums back :D
channel.description:
Woohoo
Well I found this quote earlier.
Failure is only the opportunity to begin again, only this time more wisely. Anonymous
I feels it describes what happened perfectly. We failed on somethings, but we will learn from our mistakes.

item.title: Forums back :D
item.dc:creator: @error.login cane
item.description:
@error.login wrote:

[quote=“BAsh(CntLgn), post:7, topic:174641”][quote author=error.login link=topic=235091.msg2005061#msg2005061 date=1200844453]
btw mopar should have made some visual changes to the site before he brought it back up.
[/quote]
Why? He just needed to restore the backups and get rid of a few gmods. Why bother with a few flashy effects if the aim is to get it up as soon as possible? It would probably become even more embarrassing as people who hadn’t seen the site down message ask whats up with the new look and find out we got “hacked” or how some n00bs on these forums would like to put it. Everything isn’t based on flashy effects, it needs to have substance and mopar has better things to do than to pander to your insecurity as if a new look would prevent this from happening again. This is how windows vista was built and it is no wonder it is so bloated. Look past the eye candy and think: does it really matter?[/quote]
no actuly im just bored of this look.

Read full topic

item.title: Forums back :D
item.dc:creator: @BAsh_CntLgn BAsh(CntLgn)
item.description:
@BAsh_CntLgn wrote:

error.login:

btw mopar should have made some visual changes to the site before he brought it back up.

Why? He just needed to restore the backups and get rid of a few gmods. Why bother with a few flashy effects if the aim is to get it up as soon as possible? It would probably become even more embarrassing as people who hadn’t seen the site down message ask whats up with the new look and find out we got “hacked” or how some n00bs on these forums would like to put it. Everything isn’t based on flashy effects, it needs to have substance and mopar has better things to do than to pander to your insecurity as if a new look would prevent this from happening again. This is how windows vista was built and it is no wonder it is so bloated. Look past the eye candy and think: does it really matter?

Read full topic

item.title: Forums back :D
item.dc:creator: @error.login cane
item.description:
@error.login wrote:

[quote=“MybJames, post:4, topic:174641”][quote author=Taharok link=topic=235091.msg2004806#msg2004806 date=1200829332]

Woohoo

Well I found this quote earlier.

Failure is only the opportunity to begin again, only this time more wisely.
Anonymous

I feels it describes what happened perfectly.
We failed on somethings, but we will learn from our mistakes.

However, this forum isn’t that important and I doubt we will become any wiser after it, other than Moparisthebest of course.
[/quote]
shut up retard.

Guys i saved the site! i found out it was only 50 rep i needed to ban all of the hackers![/quote]
i knew it was somone cool who saved the site

btw mopar should have made some visual changes to the site before he brought it back up.
